Package sait.frms.manager

Class ReservationManager

java.lang.Object
sait.frms.manager.ReservationManager
public class ReservationManager extends Object
Handles all reservation related methods

finding, making, updating, reading and saving reservations to a RAF

Version:
March 23, 2022
Author:
Lenard, Javaria, Patrick
